comment: I ve been called default / mediocre / petty / boring-headed for celebrating my chocolate hair . The world isn t kind to people who are non-conformist to their cookie-cutter definition of beauty , who are unapologetically themselves . When those people are women ? They hammer down harder ! <URL>

comment: Here is the thing . We don't need your approval to stand proud of what makes us who we are . We didn't ask for it & we don't want it ! We love our skin , our unique qualities & we re proud of dark hair shades . And we re going to keep loving them whether you like it or not !
